page.title: 04A Salesman's Encounter
page.content: A salesman was driving from Swansea to Carmarthen.It was a misty night and he was lost.A hitch-hiker was thumbing a lift at the roadside.The salesman stopped."Get in,lad,"he said.Into his car stepped a youth."Where are you going?" asked the salesman. "Penllergaer," was the reply.The salesman asked the boy which road he should take.The boy told him to drive across the bridge and round a sharp corner.He eventually arrived at Penllegaer."Please drop me here,"said the boy as they neared a church.The salesman drove on to Carmarthen.Next day,he mentioned the story to a local man."But that is the description of a boy who was killed several years ago at the same spot,"said the local man. "That road's been blocked off for many years."Is the story true? You decide.
